meanings.definition: The territory or dignity of a duke.
meanings.sent1: The dukedom was a vast land ruled by the duke.
meanings.sent2: She inherited the dukedom after her father passed away.
meanings.sent3: The dukedom was so large that it took days to travel from one end to the other.
meanings.sent4: In his eyes, the dukedom symbolized power and authority.
meanings.sent5: The lush green fields of the dukedom stretched as far as the eye could see.

meanings.definition: The rank or title of a duke.
meanings.sent1: He was granted the dukedom for his bravery in battle.
meanings.sent2: The dukedom came with great responsibilities and privileges.
meanings.sent3: The dukedom was the highest title one could achieve in the kingdom.
meanings.sent4: To him, the dukedom represented honor and nobility.
meanings.sent5: The announcement of his dukedom echoed throughout the entire kingdom.
